title: Democratic debate 2019: Live video & analysis from Houston
text:
Hey! I’m watching the Texans: Beto O’Rourke and Julián Castro. Like David Siders and I wrote this morning, they’re two of the state’s biggest stars. But on this stage, they’re small fish in a small pond, positioned side by side on the far end of the stage.

But having a debate in Houston could give the politicians from El Paso and San Antonio extra opportunities to stand out compared to other low-polling candidates who are on stage tonight. I expect tonight to be largely about Biden, Warren and Bernie, but I wouldn’t be surprised if the Texas candidates got a little love from the moderators since the debate is on their turf.

Like Democratic consultant Chris Lippincott told Siders for our story: “They have to stay relevant, they have to stay in the discussion, and they have to hope that that is enough to give them enough fundraising, give enough money to their campaigns to keep moving.”
description: Get real-time analysis from our 2020 team as you watch the third Democratic Debate in Houston.
